entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY THIS AFTERNOON
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 30
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY AND BREEZY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND BREEZY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
BREEZY AND MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
